Matt McCoy's Brazilian Jiu Jitsu Acadmey

Learn self-defense at a reasonable price!


Learn how to defend yourself, and have fun doing it!


Learn how to fight like UFC fighters!

We offer:

-Brazilian Jiu Jitsu classes
-Muay Thai classes
-Wrestling classes
-Boxing classes


Basic Level
$50 per month
  1. Intro to BJJ classes
  2. 1 Boxing class per week
  3. 1 Wrestling class per week
  4. Open mat every Saturday
Intermediate Level
$100 per month
  1. Intermediate BJJ classes
  2. 2 Boxing classes per week
  3. 2 Wrestling classes per week
  4. 1 Muay Thai class per week
Expert Level
$150 per month
  1. Expert BJJ classes
  2. Unlimited Wrestling classes per week
  3. Unlimited Boxing classes per week
  4. Unlimited Muay Thai classes per week
